footer.description: Your guide to electric and hybrid vehicles in Albania. Find dealerships, compare models, and join the electric revolution.

home.metaTitle: Makina Elektrike | Albania's Electric & Hybrid Vehicle Hub
home.metaDescription: Search verified electric vehicle dealers, compare EV models and learn about charging in Albania with Makina Elektrike.
home.valueTitle: Everything you need to go electric
home.valueSubtitle: Makina Elektrike combines data, editorial guidance and verified partners so you can make a confident switch to electric mobility.

valueHighlights.title: Verified dealers
valueHighlights.description: Profiles are vetted and updated so you always know who is authorised to sell and service electric vehicles in Albania.

valueHighlights.title: Complete model data
valueHighlights.description: Compare WLTP range, charging speeds, battery sizes and equipment across dozens of EV and hybrid models.

valueHighlights.title: Decision support
valueHighlights.description: Get practical guides, incentives information and FAQs tailored to Albanian drivers and businesses.

home.insightsSubtitle: Understand how the market is evolving and what that means for your next purchase or fleet upgrade.

insights.title: Charging network
insights.description: Over 120 public charging points are active nationwide, with rapid DC stations connecting the Tirana–Durrës corridor.

insights.title: Total cost of ownership
insights.description: Average energy cost per 100 km with an EV is €2–€3, less than half the fuel spend of comparable petrol vehicles.

insights.title: Maintenance savings
insights.description: Electric drivetrains remove oil changes, exhaust repairs and timing belts—reducing annual workshop visits by up to 40%.

insights.title: Government incentives
insights.description: Customs duties and VAT are waived for new EV imports, while several municipalities offer preferential parking schemes.

home.faqSubtitle: Quick answers to the most common questions we receive from Albanian EV shoppers.

faqItems.question: Do I need a home charger to own an EV?
faqItems.answer: A dedicated wallbox is recommended for daily convenience, but many drivers rely on public AC points or workplace charging.

faqItems.question: How long does the registration process take?
faqItems.answer: Dealers featured on Makina Elektrike handle homologation and registration, usually within two to four working days.

faqItems.question: Can I test drive before committing?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Each verified dealer page includes contact details to book EV test drives across Tirana, Durrës, Shkodër and beyond.

home.searchLiveResultsDefault: Use filters to discover featured electric dealers across Albania.
home.searchLiveResultsEmpty: No dealers match your filters yet — try a different city or brand.

dealersPage.introSubtitle: Every listing is manually reviewed to ensure it represents an active dealership with experience in electric mobility.
dealersPage.insightsSubtitle: Use these quick tips to understand which dealership best matches your expectations.

insights.title: Certification & service
insights.description: Ask about factory training, EV-specific tooling and battery diagnostics to guarantee long-term support.

insights.title: Charging assistance
insights.description: Dealers often partner with installers—confirm whether they can help set up a home or business wallbox.

insights.title: Financing & trade-ins
insights.description: Dedicated EV financing and trade-in programmes can lower upfront cost and speed up your switch to electric.

dealersPage.faqSubtitle: Helpful guidance for getting the most from the Makina Elektrike dealer list.

faqItems.question: How often are dealer listings updated?
faqItems.answer: Our team validates contact details and inventory highlights monthly, and whenever a partner submits changes.

faqItems.question: Can I request a new brand to be added?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely. Use the contact form to suggest new electric brands or importers and we will follow up with verification.

faqItems.question: What does the approval badge mean?
faqItems.answer: Dealers marked as approved have completed our onboarding checklist and provide confirmed EV expertise in Albania.

guidance.title: What happens after you sign in
guidance.description: We personalise the experience depending on your role so you immediately see the tools that matter.
guidance.userDescription: Track favourites, compare models, and message dealers when you're ready to book a test drive.
guidance.dealerDescription: Update opening hours, add new models, and review pending enquiries from interested buyers.
guidance.security: All sessions are secured with encrypted authentication provided by Firebase.

errors.missingFields: Enter both email and password to continue.

loginPage.metaDescription: Sign in to manage your saved electric vehicle research or update your dealership presence.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We explain how Makina Elektrike collects, uses and protects your personal data when you browse the platform or create an account.

sections.title: Information we collect
items: Account details provided during registration such as name, email address and organisation.
Usage analytics that help us understand how visitors interact with pages, search filters and listings.
Content you submit directly, including enquiries to dealers or feedback sent via forms.

sections.title: How we use your data
items: To deliver personalised features like saved favourites and recently viewed pages.
To connect dealers with interested shoppers and facilitate follow-up conversations.
To maintain platform security, prevent abuse and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Your rights
items: Request access to the data we hold about you and receive a portable copy.
Ask for corrections, updates or deletion of personal information when appropriate.
Withdraw consent for marketing communications at any time using the links provided.

privacy.metaDescription: Understand how Makina Elektrike handles account information, analytics data and communications.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms outline the acceptable use of the Makina Elektrike website and the responsibilities of our community.

sections.title: Using the platform
items: You may browse listings and content for personal or business research related to electric mobility.
Do not copy or republish data without permission or automated scraping of dealer and model information.
Respect intellectual property rights and the privacy of other members when posting or sharing links.

sections.title: Accounts and access
items: Provide accurate information during registration and keep login credentials secure.
Dealer accounts remain subject to verification. We may suspend access if profile data is incomplete or misleading.
Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorised use of your account or credentials.

sections.title: Liability
items: Makina Elektrike curates information but cannot guarantee that every listing or price is error-free.
We are not responsible for agreements negotiated directly between dealers and drivers.
The platform is provided “as is”; service interruptions may occur during maintenance or upgrades.

terms.metaDescription: Review the conditions for using Makina Elektrike, including account rules and limitations of liability.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: Cookies help us deliver a tailored experience, measure performance and remember your preferences.

sections.title: Types of cookies
items: Essential cookies keep you signed in, secure forms and enable basic functionality.
Analytics cookies show us which pages attract the most interest so we can improve navigation.
Preference cookies remember language choices and recently viewed dealers or models.

sections.title: Managing cookies
items: Most browsers let you delete or block cookies through their settings.
You can opt out of analytics tracking by enabling “Do Not Track” or adjusting cookie preferences.
Disabling certain cookies may reduce personalised features such as saved favourites.

sections.title: Third-party services
items: We may embed trusted services like map providers or video platforms that set their own cookies.
Those providers follow separate privacy policies; review them if you have specific concerns.
You can contact us for more detail about third-party integrations and data processors.

cookies.metaDescription: Learn which cookies Makina Elektrike uses and how to control analytics or preference settings.

dealerDetails.notAvailableDescription: This dealership is no longer available or is undergoing review.
dealerDetails.notAvailableMessage: This dealer is not currently active on Makina Elektrike.
dealerDetails.metaDescription: Discover {{name}} in {{city}} — authorised retailer for {{brands}} and specialist support for electric drivers in Albania.
dealerDetails.aboutDescription: {{name}} helps drivers in {{city}} experience electric mobility with dedicated advisers and certified service for {{brands}}.
dealerDetails.faqSubtitle: Practical details before you visit the showroom.

faqItems.question: Do you offer test drives?
faqItems.answer: Most partners can organise test drives within 24–48 hours. Contact the dealer directly to confirm vehicle availability.

faqItems.question: What documents should I bring?
faqItems.answer: Prepare identification, driving licence and (if financing) income documentation so the dealer can process your request quickly.

faqItems.question: Can the dealer help with charging installation?
faqItems.answer: Yes, many dealers collaborate with certified electricians and can coordinate a home or workplace charger installation for you.

modelsPage.title: Electric & Hybrid Models
modelsPage.subtitle: Compare specifications, range and charging speeds for vehicles available in Albania.
modelsPage.noResults: No models found matching your criteria.
modelsPage.metaTitle: Electric car catalogue for Albania | Makina Elektrike
modelsPage.metaDescription: Browse technical data for EV and hybrid models: WLTP range, battery size, charging speeds and dealer availability.
modelsPage.introSubtitle: Filter by body style, range or brand to build a shortlist that matches your driving habits and budget.
modelsPage.insightsSubtitle: Key considerations when comparing electric vehicles side by side.

insights.title: Battery capacity vs. usage
insights.description: City drivers often do well with 50–60 kWh packs, while frequent highway travellers should target 70 kWh or more.

insights.title: Charging curve
insights.description: Look beyond peak kW—steady charging curves reduce downtime on road trips even if the headline figure is moderate.

insights.title: Software & updates
insights.description: Ask whether the vehicle supports over-the-air updates and connected services that improve efficiency over time.

modelsPage.faqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions from first-time EV buyers.

faqItems.question: What is WLTP and why does it matter?
faqItems.answer: WLTP is the European efficiency cycle. It provides a realistic estimate of range so you can compare models on equal terms.

faqItems.question: Can I filter only by rapid-charging capability?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Use the filters to focus on 100 kW+ DC charging or manually review the charging specifications on each model page.

faqItems.question: Are plug-in hybrids included?
faqItems.answer: Where available, we include PHEVs with meaningful electric range so you can evaluate them alongside full battery-electric models.

modelDetails.metaDescription: View detailed data for {{brand}} {{model}} — WLTP range {{range}} km, battery {{battery}} kWh and charging performance.
modelDetails.faqSubtitle: Good to know before requesting a quote or test drive.

faqItems.question: How does cold weather affect the range?
faqItems.answer: Expect a temporary reduction of 10–15% during Albanian winters. Preconditioning and eco driving help maintain range.

faqItems.question: Is the battery covered by warranty?
faqItems.answer: Most manufacturers offer 8-year / 160,000 km coverage, guaranteeing the battery remains above 70% capacity.

faqItems.question: What home charging do I need?
faqItems.answer: A 7.4 kW wallbox on a dedicated circuit is ideal; models supporting 11 kW three-phase charging reduce top-up times further.

blogPage.title: Our Blog
blogPage.subtitle: News, guides, and insights into the world of electric vehicles.
blogPage.metaTitle: Electric mobility insights | Makina Elektrike Blog
blogPage.metaDescription: Read guides about EV ownership, charging infrastructure, incentives and model comparisons tailored to Albania.
blogPage.introSubtitle: Stay informed with fact-checked articles that translate global EV trends into local opportunities.
blogPage.insightsSubtitle: The blog covers everything from policy updates to maintenance best practices.

insights.title: Charging best practices
insights.description: Discover how to balance home, workplace and public charging for maximum convenience and battery health.

insights.title: Incentives explained
insights.description: Understand customs, VAT exemptions and municipal programmes that reduce the cost of going electric.

insights.title: Real-world case studies
insights.description: See how Albanian households and fleets are reducing running costs and emissions with EV adoption.

blogPage.faqSubtitle: Helpful notes about our editorial process.

faqItems.question: Who writes the articles?
faqItems.answer: Our editorial team collaborates with local experts, dealerships and infrastructure providers to ensure accuracy.

faqItems.question: How often is new content published?
faqItems.answer: We publish fresh stories every week, plus timely updates when new incentives or major models launch.

faqItems.question: Can I suggest a topic?
faqItems.answer: Yes, send us your ideas via the contact form and we will consider them for upcoming guides and interviews.

aboutPage.title: About Makina Elektrike
aboutPage.metaTitle: About Makina Elektrike | EV directory for Albania
aboutPage.metaDescription: Learn how Makina Elektrike connects Albanian drivers with electric vehicles, dealerships and trusted advice.
aboutPage.p1: Makina Elektrike is the premier online directory for electric and hybrid vehicles in Albania. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of sustainable transportation by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly platform for prospective buyers.
aboutPage.p2: We connect you with a wide network of official dealerships and importers, offering detailed information on the latest EV models available in the country. From technical specifications to dealership locations, we aim to be your one-stop resource for everything electric.
aboutPage.p3: Whether you're a seasoned EV enthusiast or just starting to explore your options, Makina Elektrike is here to guide you on your journey towards a cleaner, greener future on the road.
aboutPage.p4: Our team monitors market developments, charging infrastructure and policy updates so Albanian consumers and businesses can make informed decisions at every step.

pillars.title: Transparency
pillars.description: We prioritise verified data, clear pricing context and unbiased comparisons for all vehicles and dealers.

pillars.title: Local expertise
pillars.description: Guides and resources are written with Albanian roads, energy costs and regulations in mind.

pillars.title: Continuous innovation
pillars.description: We iterate quickly, adding new tools—from comparison charts to lead tracking—to support the EV ecosystem.

aboutPage.faqSubtitle: More context about our platform and how we work with partners.

faqItems.question: Is Makina Elektrike independent?
faqItems.answer: Yes. We collaborate with dealerships but maintain editorial independence to ensure trustworthy recommendations.

faqItems.question: How can dealers partner with you?
faqItems.answer: Dealers can apply through the registration page; our team verifies credentials and onboards approved partners.

faqItems.question: Do you cover commercial fleets?
faqItems.answer: We are expanding resources for business fleets and welcome enquiries from logistics, taxi and corporate operators.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.metaDescription: Get in touch with Makina Elektrike for partnerships, media enquiries or EV support in Albania.
contactPage.p1: Have a question, feedback, or a business inquiry? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to us via the channels below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

highlights.title: Partnership enquiries
highlights.description: Dealerships, charging providers and service partners can collaborate with us to reach more EV customers.

highlights.title: Media & press
highlights.description: We provide commentary on the Albanian EV market and can connect you with local experts for interviews.

highlights.title: Community support
highlights.description: Need help choosing an EV or charger? Send us your questions and we will point you to the right resources.

contactPage.faqSubtitle: Key information about response times and support.

faqItems.question: How fast will you reply?
faqItems.answer: We respond to most enquiries within one working day, prioritising urgent support for existing partners.

faqItems.question: Do you offer phone consultations?
faqItems.answer: Yes, book a call via email and our team will schedule a session to discuss your EV plans in detail.

faqItems.question: Where are you based?
faqItems.answer: Our core team operates from Tirana, with partner support across other major Albanian cities.

favoritesPage.insightsSubtitle: Make the most of your saved list before visiting showrooms.

insights.title: Share with your family

insights.title: Update after test drives
insights.description: Remove models that no longer fit and add notes about driving impressions to track your progress.

favoritesPage.faqSubtitle: How to manage your personalised EV watchlist.

faqItems.question: Can I export my favourites?
faqItems.answer: Yes, copy the list or capture a screenshot before sharing it with dealerships or advisors.

faqItems.question: Do favourites sync across devices?
faqItems.answer: Once logged in, your saved dealers and models are available on desktop and mobile.

faqItems.question: How many items can I save?
faqItems.answer: There is no hard limit—save as many dealers and models as you need while researching.

admin.offlineQueueEmptyState: All caught up! There are no offline submissions waiting for manual import.
